name: Pokémon: Lavender Version
description:
A remake of Adrien Dittrick's Escape from Lavender Town

Game is currently in development, check back for more updates!

I want the game to feel like you've booted up an authentic Gameboy Cartridge
so a lot of work has gone into the visuals and animations 

This is a fan game created under Fair Use. All copyright belongs to their respective owners. I do not own or have the copyright to Pokemon, copyright belongs to Nintendo and GameFreak.
